azuread_service_principal.description: Manages a Service Principal associated with an Application within Azure Active Directory.

application_id.description: The ID of the Azure AD Application for which to create a Service Principal.

app_role_assignment_required.description: Does this Service Principal require an AppRoleAssignment to a user or group before Azure AD will issue a user or access token to the application? Defaults to `false`.

tags.description: A list of tags to apply to the Service Principal.

id.description: The unique identifier for one of the `OAuth2Permission`.

application_id.description: The Application ID (appId) for the Service Principal.

display_name.description: The Display Name of the Azure Active Directory Application associated with this Service Principal.

app_role_assignment_required.description: Whether this Service Principal requires an AppRoleAssignment to a user or group before Azure AD will issue a user or access token to the application.

oauth2_permissions.description: A collection of OAuth 2.0 permissions exposed by the associated application. Each permission is covered by a `oauth2_permission` block as documented below.

admin_consent_description.description: The description of the admin consent.

admin_consent_display_name.description: The display name of the admin consent.

user_consent_description.description: The description of the user consent.

user_consent_display_name.description: The display name of the user consent.
